sentences.en: A dishonest man does not scruple to deceive others.
sentences.cn: 不诚实的人不顾忌行骗.

sentences.en: a man with no moral scruples
sentences.cn: 一个道德上无所顾忌的男人

sentences.en: and every speculative scruple will be solved by practical public blessing.
sentences.cn: 并且每一个推测性的踌躇都将为符合实际的公共祝福所解决。

sentences.en: Don't scruple to ask for anything you want.
He acted wrongly and without scruple.
He did not scruple to talk crudely either.
sentences.cn: 年青人毫无拘束的还加上许多粗话蠢话.

sentences.en: He does not scruple at [ about ] lying.
sentences.cn: 他对于说谎不会感到内疚 [ 他说起谎来毫无顾忌 ].

sentences.en: He doesn't scruple at [ about ] lying.
sentences.cn: 他对于说谎不会感到内疚 [ 他说起谎来毫无顾忌 ].

sentences.en: He makes no scruple to tell a lie.
sentences.cn: 他说起谎来无所顾忌;他肆无忌惮地说谎.

sentences.en: He will do anything without scruple.
sentences.cn: 他任何(恶)事都做得出来.

sentences.en: It'seemed to her now that she could marry him without the remnant of a scruple.
sentences.cn: 她觉得现在她可以跟他成婚而不需要有任何顾忌.

sentences.en: Jane did it at once, and made no scruple about it.
sentences.cn: 简毫不犹豫,立刻就办了.

sentences.en: My only scruple in advising the match was on his account.
sentences.cn: 当我参谋这桩婚事的时候,我唯一的顾虑倒是为了他的缘故.

sentences.en: She will tell lies without scruple.
She wouldn't scruple to tell a lie if she thought it would be useful.
sentences.cn: 她只要认为说谎有利,就连犹豫都不犹豫.

sentences.en: The villain made no scruple of committing murder.
They did not scruple to bomb innocent civilians.
sentences.cn: 他们毫无顾忌地轰炸无辜平民。

sentences.en: Thrift is care and scruple in the spending of one's means.
sentences.cn: 节俭是对于钱财的花费所持的一种审慎和顾虑的态度.

words.tran_cn: 严谨地；小心翼翼地；多顾虑地

phrases.tran_cn: 肆无忌惮地，毫无顾忌地

trans.tran_cn: 良心上的不安，顾虑，顾忌
trans.tran_en: a belief about what is right and wrong that prevents you from doing bad things

trans.tran_cn: 踌躇， 顾忌， 顾虑
trans.tran_en: a belief about what is right and wrong that prevents you from doing bad things
to be willing to do something even though it may be wrong or may upset people
